name: Dim (Niven Hedinger)
description:
Dim is a supernatural horror story, with a creepy elements and characters, who are intrigued by the events in the forest. Some say it's a myth, but other believe that the dim light can consume someone's soul and keep them forever. 

Game is made with Power Point, I used some brushed for the pictures, pixelated style was a personal choice and overall, all the music and design is original. Including the story. Thanks a lot to my friend Sam Ferguson, who is credited in the game. Gameplay time 5-10 minutes.

Comments and critical reviews are very welcome. Please, don't hesitate to like, share or comment. Thanks for playing and have an amazing experience.
